% \begin{autogenerated}
\begin{autogenerated}
\begin{longtable}{p{0.22\textwidth}p{0.73\textwidth}}
\toprule
\textbf{Purpose} & Govern lifecycle stewardship of civic data, ensuring lawful collection, minimised retention, and restitution paths. \ 
\midrule
\textbf{Obligations} & \begin{itemize}
\item Data custodians \shall{publish lawful basis statements} for every dataset prior to ingestion.
\item Privacy officers \shall{open an incident ticket within 24 hours} of discovering exposure or misuse.
\item Programme owners \should{issue stewardship summaries to affected communities} with remediation progress.
\end{itemize} \ 
\midrule
\textbf{Verification Artefact} & Data stewardship register including consent proofs, minimisation checks, and incident references. \ 
\midrule
\textbf{AEIP Schema} & \texttt{schemas/drr-schema.yaml} \ 
\midrule
\textbf{Evidence Fields} & \begin{itemize}
\item \texttt{datasets[].lawful_basis}
\item \texttt{retention.minimum_duration_days}
\item \texttt{incidents[].reference_id}
\end{itemize} \ 
\bottomrule
\end{longtable}
\textbf{Verification Example}\label{tab:layer2-verification}\par
\begin{lstlisting}[language=json,caption={Verification artefact for layer2},label={lst:layer2-example}]
{\n  "datasets": [\n    {\n      "name": "housing_applications",\n      "lawful_basis": "Municipal Housing Act 2022 ยง14",\n      "retention": "365"\n    }\n  ],\n  "incidents": [\n    {\n      "reference_id": "INC-2025-0042",\n      "status": "remediated"\n    }\n  ]\n}
\end{lstlisting}
\end{autogenerated}
